name: Leech Man
description:
Originally an Entry for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend Game Jam

Running into compiling issues I didn't make the jam in time so I fixed some bugs and gave it an ending for a finalized version.

Controls:

W / S - Move Forward / Back

A / D - Turn Left / Right

F - Interact

Q / E - Look Down / Up

Left Shift - Run

Control - Crouch

Escape - Pause Game

F11 - Window/Fullscreen
